column1: 38448,Fear Itself: Youth in Revolt (2011) #4,4,16478,142,"FEAR ITSELF TIE-IN! Sometimes, all it can take is a single moment. A moment that can irrevocably change the course of everything. It can spark innovation, or destroy worlds, or shake a person to their very core. For Gravity, that moment has come, and this is what he intends to do about it...",
